title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
description: When attempting to set the output location and classpath in the project settings, the current behavior is causing an error. Pressing 'Ok' after setting the output location and classpath results in the following error message: 'Cannot nest outputfolder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are currently treated as two separate operations. Setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
OB: After setting the output location and classpath, pressing 'Ok' results in the error message: 'Cannot nest outputfolder /xy in source folder /xy/src'
EB: After setting the output location and classpath, pressing 'Ok' should not trigger any error messages
SR:
1. Open the project settings
2. Set the output location to '/xy'
3. Set the classpath
4. Press 'Ok'
